thread.title: This Morning viewers bemused by Trinny's appearance
thread.title_full: This Morning viewers bemused by Trinny's appearance

title: This Morning viewers bemused by Trinny's appearance
text: Buy now Then she revealed she had phlegm caught in her throat before going to spit it out on the studio floor. 'I was just going to spit that phlegm somewhere else,' she said, turning her head back towards a bemused Phillip and Holly Willoughby. 'Sorry, that was so undignified,' she said. 'You know when you get it caught in your mouth? 'I could hardly talk so I had to send it back down the other way.' Needing to spit Trinny gave viewers a little too much information during the studio discussion Cringe! Holly and Phillip were left speechless as Trinny described her throat issues Erratic: Some viewers were left bemused by Trinny's appearance on the show Undignified: Trinny apologised for her behaviour on the show A speechless Phillip then told Trinny to 'stop it' before asking her: 'At one point do you think you would like to be on television?' The TV presenter replied: 'Ready,' before moving on to her fashion segment but not before bewildering a slew of This Morning viewers. Many even took to Twitter to question whether the presenter was 'drunk. ' Speculation: Fans took to Twitter to write about Trinny's erratic behaviour A confident showing: Trinny had no qualms about revealing she'd been about to spit 'Has Trinny been drinking?' one fan asked, while another questioned whether the presenter had 'been on the sauce.' 'Trinny is definitely 'p****d on This Morning like,' a third viewer tweeted. Other viewers were more dissatisfied with Trinny bringing up her phlegm problem. Stop it! Trinny was told to 'stop it' by bemusedf presenter Phillip Schofield Disgusted: Many fans found Trinny's behaviour 'erratic' and 'unprofessional' 'I'm disgusted with Trinny saying she had flem (sic) in her mouth in the middle of eating my dinner,' one vented. Another fan described the star as 'unprofessional' while one even tweeted that she was a 'full on car crash.' Mail Online have reached out to Trinny's representative for comment. Fashionista: Trinny was presenting a fashion segment on the morning show Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
